metadata.title: CVE-2023-4074 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Blink Task Scheduling in Google Chrome prior to115.0.5790.170 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
